key.name: use-opengl
key.description: Whether to render the graphics into an OpenGL viewport. When set to false, the raster engine is used.

key.name: super-key-enable
key.description: Whether or not the super (also called windows key) key is used.

key.name: hide-mode
key.description: Possible values: 0: never hide; the launcher is always visible and struts are enabled 1: auto hide; the launcher will disappear after a short time if the user is not interacting with it 2: intellihide; same as above but the launcher will disappear if a window is placed on top of it

key.name: applets
key.summary: Applets to display in the panel
key.description: List of panel applets that should be displayed, in order, in the panel. Each applet name can be annotated with the prefix "!" to force that applet to be displayed only on the panel living in the leftmost screen.
